text: Itte yaru ga i. `Kare wa anata gata no ue kara, mata ashimoto kara, chobatsu o kudasu koto ga deki, mata anata gata o nakamaware sa sete konran ni ochira se, mata aru mono ni,-gai no bogyaku o ajiwawa seru koto mo dekiru.' Ware wa, ikaga ni shirushi o shimesu ka o mi nasai. Osoraku kare-ra wa etoku surudearou
